column5: Looks like the loonie hit 1.10 today.  You guys are gonna have some good bargins state side. Now might be a great time to by stuff from Cabelas.
Still got some Canadian money stashed somewhere, Matty?
yeah, but i wish i had more
Never thought I'd see the day when I read something like that....LOL.  The dollar is rising too quickly for my comfort....5 cents in the last 3 days!
for you investor types.. should i be buying US/foreign equities or cash??   still trying to wrap my head around the markets.
WhopperwannaB? Oh Nooooooooo! Sorry Phil, your cute!

I have read it will hit 1.15...  I would think better to invest in US companies as you would make money on the exchange if the dollar goes down and also on the performance of the company just my 2 cents
